page.title: 13East Brent Harvest Home 2
page.content: East Brent Harvest Home is an important event today in the life of the village and surrounding area.It is organised by a committee and the president is the Rector of East Brent. There is also a ladies committee who plan the food. The Harvest Home starts with a procession to the church for a Thanks giving service, then there is a meal for about 600 people in a large marquee.During the meal,there are two procession.The first is led by the village children followed by the ladies carrying puddings.The second is the men, carrying bread and the enormous cheese. After the meal, there is a fair, sports and dancing. It usually finishes at midnight.The East Brent Harvest Home was the first to be held in Somerset.
